verbs.description: The sour legacy of the 2016 election [V: is] further tightening its grip on Washington after the release of a critical report on the FBI 's conduct while investigating scandals linked to the vote , while a new legal front is opening with stunning allegations about the Trump family 's behavior during the campaign .
